Dwarven chalk marks dot the stone: two clean, one smudged. Recent movement.

on_success.notes: You spot a safe lane for laying mesh early.

on_fail.notes: You miss it; approach will be hurried.

beats.prompt: Quick kit audit: plates seated? powder dry? repeater mags latched?
options: If carrying `plate_mesh_mk1` and `coil_wire_bundle_std`, you may pre-string one tile.
If low on powder, mark `powder_stressed` (roleplay consequence only unless GM rules otherwise).

if_flags.gm_note: Treat as advantage-like. Use once during Hold the Cut.

else_apply.gm_note: First 2 rounds: +1 TN to movement-related tests.

end.fail_forward: Even if all checks fail, continue; just apply the winded penalty.
